definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The swamp country is inclined to poach in winter.
sentences.chinese: 這片沼澤地帶在冬季一踏就陷下去。

sentences.english: Even we have to cross a wide marsh.
sentences.chinese: 即使要穿過一大片沼澤地帶。

sentences.english: They discussed the effect of dwindling wetlands on ducks and geese.
sentences.chinese: 他們討論過沼澤地帶縮小對鴨和鵝的影響。

sentences.english: We have to cross a wide marsh.
sentences.chinese: 我們要穿過一大片沼澤地帶。

sentences.english: The backwoods folks and the swamp dwellers owned neither horses nor mules.
sentences.chinese: 邊遠林區的人和沼澤地帶的居民既無馬也沒有騾子。
